languages.text:
Сизые волны захлестнули Лорд-капитана, и легкость пропала, конечности вновь налились тяжестью... И {name} упал{mf||а} на жесткий пол лаборатории, заполненной колбами в человеческий рост. Внутри — десятки, нет, сотни богомерзких мутантов. Без рук или ног, с двумя головами, лишенные лиц или с вывернутыми наизнанку внутренностями... И все они — с белой кожей. Белыми волосами. Когтистыми, вытянутыми конечностями. И рубиновыми глазами.
"Госпожа! Дитя... дитя появилось на свет!"

traits.locale_text:
Сизые волны захлестывают Лорд-капитана, и водоворот давних воспоминаний разгоняется — все быстрее и быстрее. Легкость пропадает, конечности вновь наливаются тяжестью... И Лорд-капитан падает на жесткий пол незнакомой лаборатории, заполненной колбами в человеческий рост. Внутри — десятки, нет, сотни богомерзких мутантов. Без рук или ног, с двумя головами, лишенные лиц или с вывернутыми наизнанку внутренностями... И все они — с белой кожей. Белыми волосами. Когтистыми, вытянутыми конечностями. И рубиновыми глазами.
"Госпожа, мы наконец сделали это. Дитя... дитя появилось на свет!"

languages.text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"
languages.original_text:
Сизые волны захлестнули Лорд-капитана, и легкость пропала, конечности вновь налились тяжестью... И {name} упал{mf||а} на жесткий пол лаборатории, заполненной колбами в человеческий рост. Внутри — десятки, нет, сотни богомерзких мутантов. Без рук или ног, с двумя головами, лишенные лиц или с вывернутыми наизнанку внутренностями... И все они — с белой кожей. Белыми волосами. traits.locale_text:
Grey-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain, and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vials standing at human height. Inside them were dozens, hundreds of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

languages.text:
青灰色の波がロード・キャプテンを飲み込むと、{mf|彼|彼女}の四肢が重くなるにつれて、また明るさの感覚が消えていく。{name}は実験室の固い床に落ちた。実験室には、人の背丈まで小瓶があちこちに積み上げられていた。小瓶の中には何十、何百、いやそれ以上の、気分が悪い変異体が入っていた。腕のないもの、脚のないもの、頭がふたつあるもの、顔のないもの、内臓が体外に露出したもの…しかし、どれも白い肌を持っている。白い髪。長い刃ありし蹄。ルビーの瞳。
「奥様！子供が…子供が生まれました！」
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

traits.locale_text:
青灰色の波がロード・キャプテンを飲み込むと、{mf|彼|彼女}の四肢が重くなるにつれて、また明るさの感覚が消えていく。{name}は実験室の固い床に落ちた。実験室には、人の背丈まで小瓶があちこちに積み上げられていた。小瓶の中には何十、何百、いやそれ以上の、気分が悪い変異体が入っていた。腕のないもの、脚のないもの、頭がふたつあるもの、顔のないもの、内臓が体外に露出したもの…しかし、どれも白い肌を持っている。白い髪。長い刃ありし蹄。ルビーの瞳。
「奥様！子供が…子供が生まれました！」

languages.text:
灰蓝色的波浪吞没了舰长大人，轻飘飘的感觉消失了，{mf|他|她}的四肢变得沉重无比。{name}摔在了实验室的硬地板上，里面堆满了像人一样高的培养皿，里面装着几十个、甚至上百个令人厌恶的变种人。有的没有胳膊，有的没有腿，有的长着两个脑袋，有的没有脸，还有的内脏都翻了出来……但每个变种人都长着白色的皮肤、白色的头发、长长的爪肢，以及红宝石般的眼睛。
“女士！孩子……孩子诞生了！”
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

traits.locale_text:
灰蓝色的波浪吞没了舰长大人，轻飘飘的感觉消失了，{mf|他|她}的四肢变得沉重无比。{name}摔在了实验室的硬地板上，里面堆满了像人一样高的培养皿，里面装着几十个、甚至上百个令人厌恶的变种人。有的没有胳膊，有的没有腿，有的长着两个脑袋，有的没有脸，还有的内脏都翻了出来……但每个变种人都长着白色的皮肤、白色的头发、长长的爪肢，以及红宝石般的眼睛。
“女士！孩子……孩子出生了！”

languages.text:
Des vagues bleu-gris ont submergé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, dissipant toute sensation d'apesanteur. {name} a fini par atterrir lourdement sur le sol dur et froid d'un laboratoire encombré de dizaines, voire de centaines de cuves empilées, chacune contenant des mutants plus répugnants les uns que les autres ; certains avaient deux têtes, d'autres les entrailles exposées, et d'autres encore étaient dépourvus de bras, de jambes ou de visage... mais tous sans exception avaient la peau blanche, des cheveux opalins, de longs membres griffus et des yeux rubis.
« Ma dame ! L'Enfant... l'Enfant est née ! »
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

traits.locale_text:
Des vagues bleu-gris ont submergé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, dissipant toute sensation d'apesanteur. {name} a fini par atterrir lourdement sur le sol dur et froid d'un laboratoire encombré de dizaines, voire de centaines de cuves empilées, chacune contenant des mutants plus répugnants les uns que les autres ; certains avaient deux têtes, d'autres les entrailles exposées, et d'autres encore étaient dépourvus de bras, de jambes ou de visage... mais tous sans exception avaient la peau blanche, des cheveux opalins, de longs membres griffus et des yeux rubis.
« Ma dame ! L'enfant... l'enfant est née ! »

languages.text:
Unas oleadas de luz azul grisácea engulleron {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán; sus extremidades perdieron la sensación de ingravidez y se tornaron pesadas de nuevo. {name} aterrizó sobre el duro suelo de un laboratorio repleto de cubas de la altura de una persona. Los tarros contenían docenas, centenares incluso, de mutantes repulsivos. Algunos no tenían brazos o piernas, otros tenían dos cabezas, o carecían de rostro, o tenían las entrañas por fuera... pero todos ellos tenían la piel blanca. El cabello blanco. Largas patas con garras. Y ojos de color rubí.
«¡Mi señora! La niña... ¡ha nacido la niña!».
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

traits.locale_text:
Unas oleadas de luz azul grisácea engulleron {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán; sus extremidades perdieron la sensación de ingravidez y se tornaron pesadas de nuevo. {name} aterrizó sobre el duro suelo de un laboratorio repleto de tarros que se amontonaban a la altura de una persona. Los tarros contenían docenas, centenares incluso, de mutantes repulsivos. Algunos no tenían brazos o piernas, otros tenían dos cabezas, o carecían de rostro, o tenían las entrañas por fuera... pero todos ellos tenían la piel blanca. El cabello blanco. Largas patas con garras. Y ojos de color rubí.
«¡Mi señora! La niña... ¡ha nacido la niña!».

languages.text:
Grau-blaue Wellen verschluckten den Lord Captain, und das Gefühl der Schwerelosigkeit verschwand. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Glieder wurden wieder schwer. {name} fiel auf den harten Boden eines Laboratoriums, der mit Tanks groß wie ein Mensch bedeckt war. Darin befanden sich Dutzende widerwärtiger Mutanten, nein Hunderte. Einige hatten keine Arme oder keine Beine oder zwei Köpfe oder kein Gesicht oder ihre Innereien waren nach außen gekehrt ... aber alle hatten weiße Haut. Weiße Haare. Lange klauenbewehrte Glieder. Und rubinrote Augen.
"Mylady! Das Kind ... das Kind ist geboren!"
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

traits.locale_text:
Grau-blaue Wellen verschluckten den Lord Captain, und das Gefühl der Schwerelosigkeit verschwand. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Glieder wurden wieder schwer. {name} fiel auf den harten Boden eines Laboratoriums, der bis zur Körpergröße eines ausgewachsenen Menschen mit Phiolen bedeckt war. Darin befanden sich Dutzende widerwärtiger Mutanten, nein Hunderte. Einige hatten keine Arme oder keine Beine oder zwei Köpfe oder kein Gesicht oder ihre Innereien waren nach außen gekehrt ... aber alle hatten weiße Haut. Weiße Haare. Lange klauenbewehrte Glieder. Und rubinrote Augen.
"Mylady! Das Kind ... das Kind ist geboren!"

languages.text:
Lord Kaptan, grimsi mavi dalgalar içinde kayboldu. Tüm uzuvları yeniden ağırlaşırken içindeki hafiflik hissini yitirdi. {name}, insan boyutundaki tanklarla dolu bir laboratuvarın sert zeminine düştü. Bu tankların içinde onlarca, hatta yüzlerce iğrenç mutant vardı. Mutantlardan bazıları kolsuz veya bacaksızdı, bazılarının iki kafası vardı veya yüzü yoktu, bazılarınınsa içi dışına çıkmıştı... Ancak her birinin derisi beyazdı. Saçları beyazdı. Uzuvları uzun ve pençe gibi keskindi. Gözleri ise yakut kırmızısıydı.
"Leydim! Çocuk... Çocuk doğdu!"
languages.original_text:
Greyish-blue waves swallowed the Lord Captain and the feeling of lightness disappeared as {mf|his|her} limbs grew heavy again. {name} fell on the hard floor of a laboratory cluttered with vats as tall as a human. Inside them were dozens, hundreds, even, of repulsive mutants. Some had no arms, or no legs, or two heads, or no face, or their innards turned inside out... but each had white skin. White hair. Long clawed limbs. And ruby eyes.
"My lady! The child... the child is born!"

Bu tankların içinde onlarca, hatta yüzlerce iğrenç mutant vardı. Mutantlardan bazıları kolsuz veye bacaksızdı, bazılarının iki kafası vardı veya yüzü yoktu, bazılarınınsa içi dışına çıkmıştı...
